0: Almana have a numerous selection of automobiles starting from sedans to SUV’s all the way to single cabin pickups, vans, truck and buses. Serving hundreds of clients from personal need to Corporate and Ministries. Provides you a recovery and breakdown support, roadside assistance for flat tire changing, battery boosting, spare key and fuel delivery. Provides fully covered comprehensive insurance, personal accident insurance coverage and have no hidden charge policy. Create and provide genuine offers, customized and tailor-made solutions suited for one’s needs
2: Numerous Selection Hundreds of Clients Provides you a recovery Fully Covered Genuine Offers
st_description:
Driver’s license and ID requirements: --Photographic proof of identity should be produced at the time of rental. All drivers must present a full and current driving license which has been held for at least 6 months. International driving license should be provided if the license is issued outside Qatar.
Age Requirements: --Drivers should not be less than 21 years of age and should poses a valid driving license which is more than 6 months old.
Payment Modes: --Cash; Debit Cards; Credit Cards
Insurance: --Vehicle and passengers are fully covered as per the law. Third Party Liability encompasses drivers in case of damage, including damage to passengers; Maximum coverage in case of personal injury is as per Court Judgment; Maximum coverage in case of death is as per Court Judgement.
Smoking Policy - Smoking is prohibited in our vehicles.
st_description_line_2:
Traffic Fines: --All traffic fines that are imposed on the vehicle during the rental period must be cleared by the Renter before the vehicle is Off-hired and when the company requires.
Fuel charges: -- Renters are requested to fuel the vehicle to the level which was provided at the time of rental. Failing to do so, charges would be application for filling the remaining.
LESSEE’S CAUTION: --(Prohibitions)
The vehicle will not be used:
• who is not properly licensed/Invalid to drive the vehicle.
• Is under the influence of alcoholic drinks or drugs/narcotics, or any other substance impairing consciousness or ability to react.
• Is under the age of 21years or possesses a license which is less than six-month-old.
• In any manner which would or might render the insurance void.
• To carry a greater number of persons than that for which it was designed.
• For any illegal purposes.
• For smoking any kind of substance.
• For off-road dr <
